meanings.definition: A type of sausage, typically made with pork and flavored with garlic.
meanings.sent1: I tried a delicious knockwurst at the picnic.
meanings.sent2: The knockwurst was sizzling on the grill.
meanings.sent3: The knockwurst told a funny joke to the hot dog.
meanings.sent4: The knockwurst was a flavorful symphony in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the knockwurst drew everyone to the barbecue.

meanings.sent3: I knockwursted my way through the buffet.
meanings.sent4: He knockwursted his way to culinary bliss.
meanings.sent5: Knockwursting together created a delicious meal.
